title: Hexo教程
content:
### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

### 三步合一

```
yarn run dev
```

### debug

```
hexo server -debug
hexo s -d
```

### 用 hexo admin 插件进行后台管理编辑文章

```
访问localhost:4000/admin
```
